programme.title: Na nože III
programme.sub-title: Reality show SR (2024)
programme.desc: Hostinec Raj: Reštaurácii v Slovenskom raji naoko nič nechýba, je plná ľudí, varia dobre a majiteľ nemá problém s nakupovaním drahých spotrebičov do kuchyne. Ukrýva však nepríjemné vzťahové tajomstvo. Dokáže Martin Novák presvedčiť majiteľa, aby nerobil rozdiely medzi svojimi zamestnancami? Divácky hit Na nože pokračuje na jar 2024 ďalšími premiérovými časťami. V čisto slovenskej verzii formátu Kitchen Nightmares si srdcia divákov okamžite získal renomovaný a viacerými prestížnymi oceneniami ovenčený šéfkuchár Martin Novák, ktorý sa pustil do skutočne náročnej misie - podať pomocnú ruku reštauráciám, ktoré sa z najrôznejších dôvodov ocitli v kríze, alebo dokonca na hranici krachu. V tretej sérii Martin navštívi ďalšie vybrané gastronomické prevádzky po celom Slovensku a za prítomnosti televíznych kamier sa ich pokúsi vytiahnuť z problémov. Nekladie si pri tom servítku pred ústa a niekedy je aj poriadne prísnym kritikom, za každých okolností však tiež férovým poradcom s úprimným záujmom pomôcť. Po nejakom čase Martin každú reštauráciu prekvapí svojou návštevou, aby preveril, či naozaj došlo k zlepšeniu. V závere návratu fungovanie a zapracovanie konceptu, ktorý danej reštaurácii navrhol, zhodnotí a odovzdá jej majiteľom nálepku. Tá si tak môže vyslúžiť 0 až 5 nožov, podľa toho, do akej miery je Martin so zmenou fungovania spokojný. Aj táto sezóna šou Na nože bude plná emócií, gastronomického pekla, šialených kombinácií surovín, no predovšetkým nezištnej pomoci, ktorú Martin každému jednému podniku ponúkne.

programme.title: Svadba na prvý pohľad II
programme.sub-title: Jedinečná svadobná romantická šou
programme.desc: Po tom, ako Tereza doslova zažila šok, keď na ňu pred oltárom čakal jej tréner Milan, sa rozhodla povedať mu svoje „áno“. Po vášnivej svadobnej noci ich čaká dovolenka v raji. Diana si „užíva“ Mišove výchovné metódy a ten ju v ničom nešetrí. Adama s Veronikou čaká po návrate zo svadobnej cesty spoločné bývanie. Adam má od toho veľké očakávanie. Veronika má na vec ale iný názor. Vierka s Michalom si svadobnú cestu užívajú s rozvahou. Rozvášni ich návšteva Verony?

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Obľúbená reality šou Farma je späť! Neuveriteľná 14. séria sa opäť predstaví v originálnom novom koncepte a s množstvom zaujímavých prekvapení. Jedným z nich je aj zmena na poste moderátora - populárny herec Marek Fašiang sa stane prvým mužským moderátorom v histórii šou. Na moderovanie však nebude sám. Okrem neho a hospodára Martina Bagara bude na farmárov jedným očkom dohliadať Alica – umelá inteligencia. Najprevratnejšia novinka na Farme však nezmení tradičný koncept šou. Farmári si stále budú musieť poradiť s drsnými podmienkami na statku, s nedostatkom jedla či manuálnou prácou. Alica sa bude súťažiacim pravidelne prihovárať spoza stola pravdy vo farmárskej kuchyni. Bude s nimi voliť duelantov, odovzdávať im aj odkaz od vypadnutého súťažiaceho a neustále ich sledovať. Keď to vyhodnotí ako potrebné, tak zasiahne. Farmári si budú musieť zvyknúť na to, že Alica, ako umelá inteligencia, nemá žiadne city. Nepozná ani zľutovanie. Za príjemným ženským hlasom sa skrýva silný charakter. Alicina silná stránka sú dáta a čísla. Je výborná v analýzach, o farmároch vie takmer všetko a vždy má pravdu. Za moment dokáže rozlúsknuť konflikty. Pre farmárov bude poriadnym šokom, ktorý v boji o 75-tisíc eur určite nečakali.

programme.title: Sestričky III
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Helena sa pred nemocnicou zoznamuje so sympatickým mužom, Oliverom. Uvedomí si, že už prešiel dosť dlhý čas od rozchodu s Vilom a ona je pripravená pohnúť sa ďalej. Ema zistí, že Dano sa vrátil do Bratislavy, poteší sa, ale iba do momentu, kedy sa zoznámi s jeho novou priateľkou. Táňa s Petrom riešia termín svadby. Jana sa celé dni aj noci učí do školy, je z toho na smrť vyčerpaná. Filip ju ignoruje, prekvapivo začne kurizovať primárke Marte. Má na to svoje “dôvody”.

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Kúpeľné manželstvo: Peter a Magda sa stretávajú v kúpeľoch. On tam prichádza zotaviť sa po infarkte, ona si chce oddýchnuť z vyčerpávajúceho vzťahu. Ich počiatočné antipatie sa začínajú meniť po tom, čo obaja zisťujú, že majú predsa len niečo spoločné...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Jeseň: Šesťdesiatročná Jolana prišla pred časom náhle o milovaného manžela. So stratou sa vyrovnáva len veľmi ťažko. Pomôcť jej prekonať toto obdobie sa snažia jej dvaja dospelí synovia, ktorí sú však takí rozdielni, že sa až neznesú...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Ágostonove „krštiny“: Františkova mama sa prišla sťažovať na Zuzaninu mamu - nedá sa to s ňou vydržať a hrozí fyzické násilie. František s Lászlom sa nevzdávajú a napriek nezáujmu Milky a Gergelyho im chcú kúpiť spoločne byt. Ildikó ani Zuzane sa to nepáči. Ildikó je sústredená na krštiny Ágostona - Františka. Ale ak nie je všetko podľa nej, vyhráža sa ich zrušením. Zuzana s Andrejkou v teleshopingu propagujú “Vibrotic muscle” a pridá sa aj Zuzanina mama, ktorá sa príde sťažovať na tú Františkovu. Ako dopadnú krštiny, keď psychicky rozhodená Zuzana má na starosti zohnať sviečku aj košieľku? Podarí sa susedom uzmieriť po vzájomných výčitkách? Aký je vlastne vzťah Zuzaninej a Františkovej mamy? A prečo odrazu Františkovi záleží na Lászlovej životospráve?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Vianoce: Zuzana chce konečne trochu pokoja, Vianoce budú s Františkom oslavovať len v úzkom kruhu rodiny a on to musí oznámiť Lászlovi. Milka dostala od "debilových" mamičiek ako odškodné vianočný zájazd do Thajska. Ak chce František osláviť Štedrý večer so svojím vnukom, musia si Vianoce urobiť hneď. Ani Komáromovci nebudú na Štedrý večer doma. Ildikó dostala od kolegov welness pobyt. Lászlo napriek tomu hrá urazeného, že Fero nezabojoval so Zuzanou, aby mohli byť na Vianoce spolu. František má preto veľké výčitky, ale všetko sa prezradí a nakoniec sa po roztržke kamaráti opäť zmieria. Lászlo dokonca pomôže Františkovi pripraviť naozajstnú vianočnú oslavu so stromčekom aj s kaprom. Podarí sa Lászlovi s Ildikó odcestovať na wellness pobyt? Koľko ľudí sa nakoniec zúčastní na Františkových predčasných Vianociach, ktoré boli plánované pre najužšiu rodinu?

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Michaela má 6 detí s dvomi mužmi, s druhým mužom býva u svokrovcov, keďže si nemôžu dovoliť vlastné bývanie. Jej 14 ročná dcéra Silvia však odluku od otca ťažko zvláda a často uteká aj na 2 dni preč z domu. Gizka sa rozhodne poslať ju na liečenie a učí celú rodinu ako takúto situáciu zvládať.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Rodičom na krku: Alžbeta a Štefan si dlhé roky nažívali v spokojnom, harmonickom manželstve. Jediné starosti im robí ich tridsaťročný syn, ktorý sa napriek veku správa ako teeneger a vždy sa pri problémoch spolieha na pochopenie matky, ku ktorej sa vždy vracia, keď vyrobí nejaký problém...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Pyramída. Komediálny seriál SR (2007).
programme.desc: László prepadne pyramídovej hre, na ktorú ju nahovorí sused Krajčír. Samozrejme, nachádza sa na najmenej výhodnej pozícii v pyramíde. S Ildikó sa už opájajú vidinou, ako rýchlo zbohatnú. František je racionálny a vysvetlí mu všetky úskalia tohoto podvodu. Susedská závisť je však silnejšia a hre napokon prepadnú všetci. Zháňajú ľudí, ktorí by sa boli ochotní do hry zapojiť. Ako sa to skončí? V tejto časti František lieči ešte aj leguána, ktorý má fixnú ideu, že je praveký jašter...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Roman prezradí Renáte, že Kristián je profesionálnym spoločníkom starších solventných dám. Renáta sa bude musieť rozhodnúť či bude Nore dôverovať a spojí sa s ňou proti Romanovi. Michal oľutuje, že dovolil Sebimu odsťahovať sa k Nore, ale už je neskoro.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Starosta: Strelkovci a Turianovci sú susedmi dlhé roky. Majú medzi sebou dobré vzťahy, pravidelne sa navštevujú a keď treba, aj si pomáhajú. Jedného dňa sa však všetko zmení – obe rodiny postaví proti sebe predvolebný boj...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Zvláštne priateľstvo: Manželia Martina a Peter vychovávajú šesťročnú dcérku Luciu. Momentálne však neprežívajú práve najlepšie obdobie. Peter často chodí na služobné cesty, a tak s rodinou netrávi toľko času, koľko by chcel. Martina si preto nájde kamarátku s rovnako starou dcérou. Niečo je však na Martine veľmi zvláštne...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Paula s Michalom začnú rozmýšľať nad menom pre svoju dcérku. Zuzana podá pacientke nesprávne lieky a spôsobí jej tým kolabs. Renáta s Norou sa rozhodnú Romana zničiť a ich plán vyžaduje zapojiť Jenču.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Darček. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Ďuro a Erika majú zase výročie! Celá dedina dáva pozor, aby na to Ďuro nezabudol. A Erika má pre Ďura ohromné prekvapenie.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Mínové pole. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Keď Ďuro zistí, že má s Dodom spoločné viac, ako si myslel a Sojka s Lackom sa ocitnú v pasci, Horná Dolná sa musí spoľahnúť na pomoc chlpáčov...

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Obľúbená reality šou Farma je späť! Neuveriteľná 14. séria sa opäť predstaví v originálnom novom koncepte a s množstvom zaujímavých prekvapení. programme.title: Sestričky II
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Primárka Marta ťažko nesie smrť svojho psa a rozvod, nechodí do práce a nikto nevie, kde je. Napriek tomu, že Helena sa snaží celé oddelenie viesť sama, Chromík sa pri narušení rutiny rúca a začína robiť chyby. Navyše na oddelenie prichádza atraktívna pacientka - fitneska Nora, voči ktorej Chromík zahorí dosiaľ nepoznaným citom a to ho mätie ešte viac. Helena sa snaží spojiť s Alicou, no tá sa akoby prepadla pod zem a Helenu to veľmi trápi. Na oddelenie zároveň privážajú neobvyklú pacientku – mladé transgenderové dievča, ktoré sa cíti byť a túži stať sa mužom, s čím však nie je uzrozumený jeden z jej rodičov… Táňa upozorňuje na chybu, ktorú Linda urobila pri vyšetrení, ale Linda klame a prekvapená Táňa s trpkosťou zisťuje, že medzi kolegami nenachádza podporu. Medzi Janou a Emou rastie napätie, obzvlášť po tom, ako sa Filip Jane prizná, že pobozkal Emu. Za Emou zatiaľ prichádza Tibor, ktorý prišiel poprosiť o odpustenie – vie, že mu už nezostáva veľa času, a Jana, ktorá je nechceným svedkom ich rozhovoru, sa tak dozvedá šokujúce tajomstvo o Eminej minulosti. Váha, ako s touto informáciou naloží a smerom k Filipovi urobí prekvapivé gesto.

Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Wanted. Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Gadget Kid. Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you can’t even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Visitor. Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Big TV. Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Painting. Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Wrestle Bean. Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Rare Bird. Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.sub-title: Bean's Safari. Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.
programme.desc: Join the strange but hilariously funny Mr Bean and his stuffed teddy on adventures such as avoiding an irate landlady or an evil one-eyed cat.

Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock. Ginger places her granny's old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Plant Food. At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as it's sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Whack a Gopher. Ginger and Rick's vegetable garden is growing, and they need a way to keep out the gophers. Ginger says traps are cruel, but Tom can handle the task! However, things start getting out of hand when a lady gopher falls in love with Jerry, and the two plan a garden raid together.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Hula Whoops. Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles' cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but it's no vacation. The cousin's missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: A Game of Bones. After Tyke digs up, Hammy, Spike's lucky bone, Spike reburies it right away because it's bad luck to remove it. Soon afterward, Tom gets a set of toy dog bones that do tricks, and he teases Spike and Tyke with them. When the whirly-bone buries itself and unearths Hammy for a second time, Spike recruits the other animals to help prevent the bad luck he expects.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Bull Fight. Tom and Jerry take a case from a mother tortoise to find out where her son Seymour is sneaking off to at night. They discover Seymour is self-training to win a championship boxing match, planning to pay off bills with the prize money so his mom can quit the car wash. When he offers Tom and Jerry a cut of the money to keep his secret, they take it and agree to train him—but it won't be easy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.sub-title: Hide N' Seek. The crew plays Hide N’ Seek at headquarters and Tweety is the seeker.
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Packing For France. Lu decides she is going to France with Elodie and gets packing.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Baby Horsefly. Barnaby gets scared of the big horseflies and bonds with a baby one.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Margo Mayfly. The bugs help a new bug to feel welcome in Shell School.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes II
programme.sub-title: Baby Brouhaha
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes II
programme.desc: Log Cabin Fever. Granny takes the Baby Looney Tunes back to a simpler lifestyle during a rustic weekend spent in an 1800's log cabin where they learn to enjoy life minus all modern conveniences.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chocks Away. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Royal Bean. When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers there's only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majesty's corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Young Bean. When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In the pink. Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hypnosis. Mike wakes up in the bathtub, huh? The house has been turned upside down and the other animals are being weird. They're acting like zombies and carrying food out of the house. Our pug discovers that the raccoons have hypnotised Fluffy, the turtles, and Iris, and are using them to transport the contents of the Mikkelsens fridge to their lair. Our hero will need to confront Iris to save her from the raccoon's dastardly scheme... and refill the Mikkelson's fridge!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Playing Outside. The bugs talk about playing outside.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: Mighty Mike

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Who's The Boss. Tom walks in and catches Mercury trying to break into in the garage. He thinks Mercury would make the cool, exciting pet he's always wanted. To Mike's horror, Tom makes him promise to make sure nothing happens to Mercury while he's at school. Mike, ever the obedient pooch, does his best but the turtles want Mercury out of the house. Mercury is making himself way too comfortable. Mike will need to use all his brainpower to kick the unwanted guest out of the house and enlists Freddy as an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Restaurant. Mr. Bean’s Birthday dinner gets off on the wrong foot when he and Teddy are made to take the worst table at a swanky restaurant. The evening is further ruined by a self-obsessed movie star at the next table. After a swim in the lobster tank, Mr. Bean unwittingly cooks up sweet revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Art thief. During a visit to London's National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art. Bloodhound that he is, he pursues the culprit across the Channel to Paris only to be waylaid by a Reliant Robin, a traffic jam, and a mime artist under the Eiffel Tower. Will Mr Bean ‘the International Art Sleuth’ prove successful?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scaredy Bean. Who's afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. He's very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Bean’s imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Hot Date. Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wash. Mr Bean's car is filthy so he gives it a good wash. His sparklingly clean car attracts the attention of other drivers who offer to pay Mr Bean to wash their cars too. Bean cannot resist and builds a car-washing contraption to help him out. But when a certain very posh visitor’s car gets damaged Bean thinks he’s for the chop.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Where Did You Get That Cat? Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wicket’s flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that it’s only his landlady’s furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friend’s life.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Valuable Lessons. Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesn’t trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Halloween. Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXVI
programme.desc: Let's Race: The Obstacle Race. Thomas and Friends have to dodge all the balls in the final Sodor Cup Game, and learn the real prize atop Lookout Mountain is about more than quick thinking.

programme.sub-title: Bright Beetle Lu. Lu struggles to do all the things she wants to do in her new costume.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: A Star Forlorn. When Tom finds out he won a contest to be in a cat food commercial, his behavior turns smug. This irritates Jerry, who goes to great lengths to ruin the commercial shoot at the house as Tom struggles in his role.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Bird Flue. Cates appears and assigns Tom the job of sweeping the estate's chimneys, warning him not to upset the Duchess's new exotic pet bird. Unfortunately, both the pet bird and a stork at the top of the chimney think Jerry is a worm. Soon chaos breaks out, hurting Tom's cleaning efforts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Tom's Tangled Web. In Catsylvania, a strange flying bug bites Tom, transforming him into a Tom-sized bug monster. Van Mouseling saves the village with an old-fashioned canister of bug poison, and Tom flies off to the abandoned castle on the hill. But Tom's troubles aren't over yet! Inside, he must deal with huge spider webs and a spider the size of a truck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Saddle Soreheads. Bedfordshire Bertie, a champion show horse, runs away and hides on the estate grounds, where Jerry does his best to help her hide from nosey Tom. Bertie is stressed out over a big upcoming meet, but Jerry has a calming effect on her. When Tom catches up with them, he, too, helps the horse overcome her nerves and get back to her old self.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Rosemary's Gravy. Because of an injured foot, Rick stays home with Ginger's mother, Rosemary, taking care of him. Rosemary brings her infamous fat-free-dairy-free whole wheat gravy, and she quickly puts Rick, Spike and Tom on nutritious diets. Antics and fights break out as Rick and the pets crave real food.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Eggs on a Train. Peter, a pretentious cheapskate poodle, demands that Tom and Jerry help protect his precious sapphire egg on a train journey but won't pay their fare. The cat and mouse become stowaways and go to a lot of trouble to do their job, but the outcome is unexpected.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Truffle Trouble. While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the "sponge" turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estate's new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sofa. Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. Unfortunately, a painful explosion of springs under his bottom puts an end to that. He sets about buying another one… but, alas, sofas are expensive items. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Treasure! In a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Homeless. After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Camping. An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Trojan Racoons. The raccoons find a brilliant way of getting into the Mikkelsen's house without anyone noticing by getting mailed to the house inside in a cardboard box. Mike falls for it and the raccoons are free to steal whatever they want in their few minutes of freedom inside the house. The racoons skedaddle back to their lair, but instead of stealing the loot, Mercury brings back an old grandfather clock that belonged to the family's grandmother. Now Mike has to break into the raccoon's lair, retrieve the family heirloom and give the raccoons a taste of their own medicine.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Sadness. The bugs talk about feeling sad.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Dead Cat. Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Supertrolley. Nipping to the shops for a few provisions becomes a nightmare when a mile-long shopping list from his landlady and a clapped out trolley with a wonky wheel conspire to ruin his day. Subscribing to the theory that bigger is better, he constructs his own shopping trolley incorporating a petrol mower, pram wheels and an extra pair of hydraulic hands.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Magpie. When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Cat-Sitting. After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Bean’s landlady is rushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isn’t the only thing that flies and in the end it’s Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.sub-title: Hide N' Seek. The crew plays Hide N’ Seek at headquarters and Tweety is the seeker.
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Caring Bean. Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Opera Bean. Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Taxi Bean. Mr Bean takes a taxi to his local toyshop but a dodgy cabbie thinks he can take Mr Bean for a ride. After a mix up Mr Bean finds himself driving the taxi and starts to have fun couriering people to their destinations even giving an American tourist an extensive tour of London. But will the taxi driver find out what’s been going on and how much will Bean’s final fare be?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Muscle Bean. Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time

programme.sub-title: New Library Book. Lu has trouble finding a new book she enjoys as much as her last one.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Double Dog Trouble. Spike the bulldog comes to Tom and Jerry, complaining he is being harassed by unknown creditors, ex-girlfriends, and other problems due to identity theft. They take the case on and go in search of who could be using Spike's name. It quickly becomes equally confusing for them to sort out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Hockey Jockeys. Jerry and Tuffy discover Ginger's surprise for Rick in the garage: a brand-new air hockey table. They enjoy floating in zero gravity before Tom comes in and stops the fun. Soon, Butch challenges Tom to a game, until they start chasing Tuffy into the house and out back.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Dis-Repair Man. When Tom and Jerry break a picture frame on the wall, Rick gives Tom an ultimatum that he's out for good if he breaks one more thing. Despite Tom's earnest response, he breaks something right after Rick leaves to purchase a new frame. Attempting to fix the problem, Tom borrows tools and coveralls from a repair truck nearby but can't stop breaking things in the repair process.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Hyde and Shriek. A fast-talking sales cat named Dr. Jake L. appears to Tom from a trap door in the floor, selling "Ache-Eee Bones" tonic. However, when the doctor sees Jerry and Tuffy, he instantly turns into the slobbering Mr. Hyde-Cat and chases them, but then changes back to the doctor. Tom wants to buy the tonic but soon finds out what's happening with the visiting cat and tries to get rid of him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Perfume Party. Hoping to woo Toodles, Tom decides to make some homemade perfume for her. He throws in many unusual ingredients and gets a surprisingly pleasant outcome, getting the attention he craved. However, soon Tom and Jerry must come up with a plan when the heavenly scent turns bad.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: The Royal Treatment. When Jerry overhears that a brand-new butler will arrive at the household later that day, the crafty mouse whips together a butler's outfit and knocks on the door, pretending to be the new arrival—to get unbridled access to the pantry. How long will Jerry's disguise work, and what happens when the real butler arrives?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Lightning Bug Blues. Kept awake by Tom watching TV, Jerry goes outside and encounters some lightning bugs. The smallest one can't keep up, so Jerry steals Tom's energy drink for the little guy. It helps, but soon the super-charged bug causes unexpected issues for Tom and Jerry.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V
programme.desc: A Kick in the Butler. A Tom and Jerry chase through Postlewaite Manor results in major injuries to Cates which places his defense of the Butler's Linen Gloves Boxing Title in jeopardy. But never fear, Tom will step into the ring and defend Cate's title.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Fly. When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, it's war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mime Games. A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Spring Clean. It's the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, there’s no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: No Pets. Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Bottle. Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Goldfish. With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inventor. When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who is an Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become ‘inventive’ himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost ‘a cleverness competition’, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Car Trouble. Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A New Friend. Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Lift. Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Dig This. Mr Bean attempts to build a shady gazebo in the back garden on a scorching hot day. But as he digs into the ground he unearths a huge unexploded bomb. Trying to make Mrs Wicket aware of the danger and save Scrapper and Teddy from being blown to smithereens takes courage nerve and a Bean styled homemade bomb disposal kit.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Hypnotised. Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: The Beast from the Bayou. When Tom goes through reverse evolution and is transformed into a swamp monster, he uses it to his advantage, scaring creatures that frightened him earlier. Soon he sees Van Mouseling in the woods and can't resist chasing him all over.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: All Cat Jazz. Tom blows on a trumpet to dislodge Jerry from his hiding place, which leads to Frankie the rat convincing Tom he's a great trumpeter. Frankie plays manager, Jerry joins in as percussionist, and they audition neighborhood animals for a third member of their jazz trio. Unfortunately, when Spike is chosen on the upright double bass, rivalries spark up and nerves threaten the trio's success.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Magic Hat Cat. A magician's hat is left behind at Ginger and Rick's house. Jerry runs into it, but when Tom reaches in after him, all he gets are multiple magician props. Tyke and Spike soon join in, and the top hat continues to wreak havoc.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Wrap Star. Skullie warns Tom that it's almost midnight, so he'd best be on alert for one of the Catsylvania ghouls to show up. Tom reaches for a towel to wipe the soap out of his eyes but is shocked to discover that he's not using a towel at all, but a Mummy-cat's wrap! Soon, the Mummy-cat finds ways to freak out Tom and befuddle him, Jerry and Tuffy all over the house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Charm School Dropouts. When Tom and Butch both arrive to ask out Toodles, their competitive behavior prompts her to send them away to a charm school she recently attended. But how will they fare in the grueling etiquette courses taught by elegant cat instructors?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Driven Crazy. Things go awry when Cates orders Tom to clean and inspect the family automobile. Tom, Jerry and Tuffy end up taking the car into the countryside and doing their best to control it. As Tom reads and attempts to follow the instruction manual, Jerry and Tuffy help, but they also suffer many near-misses.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Ray of Sunshine. It’s a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Birthday Bear. Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Mole. Mr. Bean’s landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Roadworks. Mr. Bean’s tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III

No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Siblings. The bugs talk about having fun with their siblings.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.
